Note: Participant notices that video and image quality is less detailed and harder to see given the transparency of the screen in a brighter setting and overall dimness
Participant is watching media on MR glasses display but also notices many things happening on the road as a passenger
Participant notices a glare on the right side of glasses from the sun but claims that it does not affect view of display
Participant feels that they are straining their eyes to see videos on MR display given poor video quality

Participant expected to feel more motion sickness but says they are feeling good so far as they are able to watch videos on MR display but also focus on the road at the same time (pass through screen is helpful)
Participant made moderators aware that they are susceptible to motion sickness and actively avoid being a passenger especially while focusing on anything other than the road
Participant has been eating ginger chews - 2 so far. One at start of study and 1 at this moment
Participant notices that they feel more car sick watching reels on the phone vs reels on the MR display
Participant notices that they are straining their eyes more watching reels on the phone but is not sure why
